mapper.select: SELECT board.identity, board.title, board.content, board.created, board.view, board.user , IFNULL(COUNT(comment.identity), 0) AS "comments" FROM smile.board_notice board LEFT JOIN smile.comment_notice comment ON board.identity = comment.board GROUP BY smile.board.identity ORDER BY smile.board.identity DESC LIMIT ${start}, ${end}
select identity, title, content, created, view, user from board_notice where identity=#{identity}
mapper.update: update board_notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where identity=#{identity}
